oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sampling and Testing for the Endophyte
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lacefield, Garry
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: endophyte
Kentucky
tall fescue
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Several states now have service laboratories available for endophyte testing. Variations do exist among states in specific details on sampling. Within each state one should consult the Extension service for necessary details on sampling. The following information is restricted to the Kentucky program and is excerpted from University of Kentucky publication PPA-30 written by Dr. W. C. Nesmith and colleagues.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1986; 145-146
